labels.alwaysOpen: I'm always open to new opportunities and collaborations. Feel free to reach out through any of the channels below!

hero.title: Farrukh — Frontend Engineer, React Specialist
hero.subtitleSuffix: with clean design, robust structure, and modern JavaScript tooling.

intro.heading: About Me
intro.text: Frontend Engineer specializing in React and Next.js, focused on building modern, scalable, and maintainable web applications with clean architecture and strong UI engineering practices.

timeline.title: Frontend Developer
description: Developed and delivered multiple real-world frontend projects covering UI implementation, state management, REST API integration, and production deployment.
Focused on scalable component architecture, clean code principles, and performance-oriented UI engineering.

timeline.title: Software Engineering Program
description: Currently expanding backend development, system-level programming, and problem-solving skills through project-based engineering education.

timeline.title: Frontend Development Program
description: Completed structured training in React, Next.js, TypeScript, state management, and modern frontend engineering practices.
